oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Biogas plant in Järna
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Schäfer, Winfried
Granstedt, Artur
Evers, Lars
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Environmental aspects
Animal husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Biodynamic Research Institute in Järna developed an on-farm biogas plant integrated within the highly self-supporting farm organism, Skilleby-Yttereneby, one of the farms studied in the BERAS project. The biogas plant digests dairy cattle manure and organic residues originating from the farm and the surrounding food processing units.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Schäfer, Winfried; Granstedt, Artur and Evers, Lars (2005) Biogas plant in Järna. In: Granstedt, Artur; Thomsson, Olof and Schneider, Thomas (Eds.) Environmental impacts of eco-local food systems - final report from BERAS work package 2. Ekologiskt lantbruk, no. 46. Sveriges lantbruksuniversitet, Centrum för uthålligt lantbruk, pp. 105-107.
